recalls.title: Featured
recalls.description: The list below provides information gathered from press releases and other public notices about certain recalls of FDA-regulated products. Not all recalls have press releases or are posted on this page. See Additional information about recalls for a more complete listing.
recalls.recallReason: A Terminated Recall is a recall where the FDA has determined that all reasonable efforts have been made to remove or correct the violative product in accordance with the recall strategy, and proper disposition has been made according to the degree of hazard. Recalls that are not indicated as being terminated are either ongoing or completed.
recalls.manufacturer: name in the Search terms box as well as the year to get the most inclusive search results

recalls.title: Recalls & Product Safety Warnings
recalls.description: Data below is populated with information from the Recall web pages on CPSC.gov. Data updates weekly as new recalls are announced. Recall Remedy data may change daily to reflect updates to company operating status or recall remedy availability. Please submit any questions about these charts to suggestions@cpsc.gov.
recalls.recallReason: The recalled magnetic floating stackers toys violate the mandatory standard for toy magnets because they contain magnets that can loosen and detach from the toy, posing an ingestion hazard to children. When high-powered magnets are swallowed, the ingested magnets can attract each other, or other metal objects, and become lodged in the digestive system. This can result in perforations, twisting, and/or blockage of the intestines, blood poisoning and death.
recalls.manufacturer: operating status or recall remedy availability

recalls.title: More Info
recalls.description: Questions about your Honda vehicle? Try our virtual chat tool.
recalls.recallReason:
Our Company puts a high priority on the safety of our products.
This website provides information about safety recalls announced in the past 15 calendar years; older recalls are not included.

All safety recall repairs are FREE at authorized Honda dealers.

For additional recall assistance, click the Ask Dave by Honda button. If you are dissatisfied with your vehicle performance or have a product complaint, please contact 
Honda Automobile Customer Service at (800) 999-1009.

recalls.title: Home Safety in Home Improvement(1000+)
recalls.description: There's nothing more important than protecting your home and family. That's why Walmart offers the great quality and Every Day Low Prices you count on in security cameras, alarms, safes, lock boxes, flashlights, locks, bolts and more.
recalls.productName: Life Fire Alarm with Magnetic Fastening Kit, Smoke Alarm with Photoelectric Sensor and Low Battery Warning Function for House, ETL-9th Listed, GS509A, 6Packs OptionsSponsored$6204current price $62
recalls.recallReason: In our door security department, you'll find door locks, bolts and chains to keep unwanted people out, door and gate viewers to see whom you're letting in, and door chimes, buzzers and bells to help control access to your home. In security and surveillance, you'll find an array of security systems, including motion sensors, cameras and alarms, to keep you safe. And in home safes and lock boxes, you'll find an array of secure ways to store your most valuable belongings. We also carry flashlights, lanterns and headlamps for safety.

recalls.title: Support
recalls.description: Safe Products for Our Everyday Lives
recalls.recallReason: A life free from products that could harm you and your family should be a given, not a concern. Yet, everyday products are associated with at least 15.5 million injuries and 8,000 deaths per year. CR pushes manufacturers and the government to recall unsafe products and eliminate unsafe designs. We also work to ensure people are informed about product safety hazards, and empower them make safe choices and push for market and policy change.

recalls.title: Support
recalls.description: Safe Products for Our Everyday Lives
recalls.recallReason: A life free from products that could harm you and your family should be a given, not a concern. Yet, everyday products are associated with at least 15.5 million injuries and 8,000 deaths per year. CR pushes manufacturers and the government to recall unsafe products and eliminate unsafe designs. We also work to ensure people are informed about product safety hazards, and empower them make safe choices and push for market and policy change.

recalls.title: Lawmakers Introduce Landmark Safer Beauty Bill Package to Address Dangerous Gaps in Cosmetic Safety
recalls.description: Bold, New Federal Legislation Will Make Beauty & Personal Care Products Safer for All by Banning the Worst Toxic Chemicals, Protecting Communities of Color, & Strengthening Transparency
recalls.productName: said Dr. James E. Rogers, Director of Product Safety Testing at Consumer Reports.
recalls.recallReason: WASHINGTON, D.C. — Today, Representatives Jan Schakowsky (IL-09), Lizzie Fletcher (TX-07), Doris Matsui (CA-07) and Ayanna Pressley (MA-07), introduced the Safer Beauty Bill Package: a sweeping bill package made up of four federal bills aimed at getting the most toxic chemicals out of make-up and personal care products, increasing ingredient and supply chain transparency, and protecting the health of at-risk populations including women of color and salon workers.

recalls.title: Skip to
recalls.description:
Our Product Safety Team proactively investigates and addresses reported safety complaints and incidents to ensure customer protection from potential product-related safety risks. We closely monitor public recall alert websites and receive notifications from vendors and sellers. Upon discovering a product recall, we immediately halt affected product offerings, and promptly inform both customers and sellers involved about the recall.
            
            
                For more information visit our 
                
                    
                    
                        
                            Safety Information, Recalls and Legal Notices Page
                        
                    
                
            .

recalls.title: Skip to
recalls.description: Amazon Resale (previously known as Amazon Warehouse) offers great deals on quality used, pre-owned, or open box products. With all the benefits of Amazon fulfilment, customer service, and returns rights, we provide discounts on used items for customer favorites: such as smartphones, laptops, tablets, home & kitchen appliances, and thousands more. For each used product we sell, we thoroughly test the condition of the item and provide detailed descriptions to make it easier for you to make a decision.
